name: Savana Hunt
description:
Open the zip file and extract, afterwards you open the "Gamejam" folder and run the "Gamejam" file

You use the arrow keys to move and jump, when you see the kudu you can use the spacebar to aim your arrows to kill the kudu

This game is a story from a village in Namibia where a lone hunter tries to kill a kudu to get meat for the rest of the village. Do you have what it takes to kill the kudu?
